description: A migrant steamship heads west to leave the old continent. The passengers, a mixed bag from all over Europe, are united by their hopes and dreams for the new century and their future abroad. But their journey takes an unexpected turn when they discover another migrant ship adrift on the open sea.

title: Dark Matter
description: An expert in astrophysics sheds light on the topic of dark matter which has been one of the primary mysteries in modern physics.

title: Lucifer
description: Lucifer Morningstar, the Devil, abandons Hell and comes to Los Angeles, where he runs a nightclub and becomes a consultant to the LAPD.

title: Midnight Mass
description: An isolated island community experiences miraculous events - and frightening omens - after the arrival of a charismatic, mysterious young priest.

title: Sausage Party: Foodtopia
description: Sausage Party: Foodtopia is an upcoming American adult computer-animated streaming television series based on the 2016 film of the same name. The series serves as a sequel to the film, continuing the adventures of Frank the sausage and his food friends in the supermarket.

title: See
description: In a dystopian future, humans have lost the ability to see, and society has adapted to a new way of life. When twins are born with sight, everything changes.

title: Supacell
description: A group of ordinary people from South London’s Ladbroke Grove are granted superpowers, but they must harness these abilities for good before it’s too late.

title: The Sandman
description: After years of imprisonment, Morpheus, the King of Dreams, embarks on a journey across worlds to find what was stolen from him and restore his power.

title: Vikings: Valhalla
description: Set over a thousand years ago in the early 11th century, Vikings: Valhalla chronicles the heroic adventures of some of the most famous Vikings who ever lived - Leif Eriksson, Freydis Eriksdotter, Harald Hardrada and the Norman King William the Conqueror. These men and women will blaze a path as they fight for survival and glory in the ever changing and evolving world.

title: You
description: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

title: 10 Lives
description: A pampered cat loses his ninth life and must learn to appreciate his remaining one while seeking help from a mystical being to restore his lost lives.

title: 3 Days in Malay
description: A small group of American Marines must defend an airfield for three days against a relentless Japanese assault during the Battle of Malaya in World War II.

title: A Family Affair
description: A pop star's unexpected romance with her assistant's mom sparks a whirlwind of complications, forcing them to confront the age gap and navigate the fallout from their secret affair.

title: Abigail
description: After a group of criminals kidnap the ballerina daughter of a powerful underworld figure, they retreat to an isolated mansion, unaware that they're locked inside with no normal little girl.

title: Abraham Ozler
description: In the shadows of a chilling serial killer case, veteran cop Abraham Ozler confronts dark secrets and heinous acts, reshaping his own fate.

title: Adults in the Room
description: A depiction of the intense and complex political negotiations during the 2015 Greek financial crisis, based on Yanis Varoufakis' memoir.

title: Agent Recon
description: A covert military task force tracks a mysterious energy disturbance at a secret base in New Mexico where experiments on alien technology areconducted.

title: Alienoid: Return To The Future
description: In Goryeo, swordsmen attempt to obtain a legendary divine blade while aliens appear through a time portal from the present. Meanwhile, in the present, the Guard chasing after the aliens and the Thunder, who escaped from the alien's human body, face a crisis of destruction from the awakened alien's spaceship.

title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
description: Arthur Curry, also known as Aquaman, joins forces with his half-brother Orm to prevent Black Manta from unleashing destruction using the Black Trident, a weapon imbued with dark magic.

title: Arcadian
description: A father and his twin teenage sons fight to survive in a remote farmhouse at the end of the world.

title: Arnold & Sly: Rivals, Friends, Icons
description: TMZ exclusively sits down with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Sylvester Stallone as they discuss for the first time how their once-fierce rivalry led to two Hollywood icons forever being friends and brothers in arms.

title: Arthur The King
description: Based on the inspirational true story of Mikael Lindnord, an ultramarathon runner who befriends a stray dog while competing in a grueling 400-mile race through the Ecuadorian jungle.

title: Article 370
description: A fictionalized account inspired by the events leading up to the abrogation of Article 370 in Jammu and Kashmir, showcasing the struggles and sacrifices of those involved in upholding the integrity of the nation.

title: Asphalt City
description: An emergency medical technician in New York City struggles with PTSD and substance abuse while navigating the high-stress demands of his job.

title: Atlas
description: When an intelligence analyst uncovers a sinister conspiracy that threatens to wipe out humanity, she must go on the run to try and stop the catastrophic attack.

title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
description: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

title: Bad Hombres
description: Two undocumented immigrants get entangled in a dangerous drug deal gone wrong and become targets of a ruthless cartel boss.

title: Bad Lands
description: A fraudster and her loose-cannon brother get their hands on a huge sum of money. Their unjustified wealth grabs attention and makes them the target of dangerous people.

title: Bade Miyan Chote Miyan
description: Two elite soldiers with troubled pasts are enlisted for a daring mission when a deadly masked villain threatens India's defenses.

title: Beverly Hills Cop: Axel F
description: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to investigate his friend's murder, teaming up with his friend's daughter and her partner to uncover a conspiracy.

title: Big City Greens: The Movie - Spacecation
description: After ruining his family's vacation before it can even begin, Cricket attempts to right his wrongs by volunteering his family for an experimental farming mission in space.

title: Bloodline Killer
description: After the murder of her family at the hands of her deranged cousin, a woman struggles to rebuild her shattered life while being relentlessly pursued by the killer.

title: Boneyard
description: When the skeletal remains of eleven women and girls are discovered in the New Mexico desert, an extensive investigation is launched. Inspired by true crime stories, this chilling crime-thriller follows Detective Ortega, Police Chief Carter, and Agent Petrovick in a multi-agency effort to identify and apprehend the killer. As each of their agendas and methods clash, a tangled web of intrigue casts suspicion in all directions.

title: Boy Kills World
description: A deaf-mute with a vibrant imagination, trained to be an assassin, seeks revenge against the dystopian overlords who killed his family.

title: Breakwater
description: A young ex-con risks his newfound freedom to track down the estranged daughter of a fellow inmate, and unknowingly brings a devil from her past straight to her doorstep.

title: Bursting Point
description: The chief inspector in the anti-narcotics unit remains steadfast in his police officer principles, risking all to combat drug-related activities and apprehend traffickers.

title: Cabrini
description: Arriving in New York City in 1889, Italian immigrant Francesca Cabrini is greeted by disease, crime, and impoverished children. She soon sets off on a daring mission to convince the mayor to secure housing and healthcare for society's most vulnerable. With broken English and poor health, Cabrini uses her entrepreneurial mind to build an empire of hope unlike anything the world has ever seen.

title: Cash Out
description: Professional thief Mason attempts his biggest heist with his brother, robbing a bank. When it goes wrong, they're trapped inside surrounded by law enforcement. Tension rises as Mason negotiates with his ex-lover, the lead negotiator.

title: Challengers
description: Tashi, a tennis player-turned-coach, has transformed her husband from a mediocre player into a world-famous grand slam champion. To jolt him out of his recent losing streak, she makes him play a challenger event - close to thelowest level of tournament on the pro tour - where he finds himself standing across the net from the once-promising, now burnt-out Patrick: his former best friend and Tashi's former boyfriend.

title: Civil War
description: In a dystopian future America, a team of military-embedded journalists races against time to reach Washington, D.C., before rebel factions descend upon the White House.

title: Cold Meat
description: David Petersen finds himself trapped in a snowy ravine during a blizzard after a car accident. While struggling to survive the harsh conditions, he realizes the cold is the least of his worries when a beast starts prowling outside.

title: Concrete Utopia
description: Survivors of a devastating earthquake in Seoul gather in the only remaining apartment building, where they face difficult choices and struggle for survival.

title: Craig Before the Creek
description: Before he and his two best friends Kelsey and JP ruled the creek, Craig Williams was the new kid in town, desperate to make some friends. It's a brand-new summer in the neighborhood, and Craig's missing everything! So he sets out to make new friends, only to learn that's easier said than done.

title: Crew
description: Hailed as 'delectable' by The Times of India, this Rajesh Krishnan-directed comedy follows three bold flight attendants caught in a gold smuggling ring.

title: Crimes of the Future
description: In a not-so-distant future, humankind is adapting to a synthetic environment, with new transformations and mutations altering their biological makeup. Performance artist Saul Tenser, celebrity for his avant-garde surgeries, publicly showcases the metamorphosis of his organs in his performances. Alongside his partner Caprice, Tenser has turned the removal of these tumors into a spectacle for his loyal followers.

title: Damaged
description: A Chicago detective travels to Scotland to investigate a series of murders with striking similarities to an unsolved case he worked on years ago.

title: Darkness of Man
description: Russell Hatch, a former Interpol operative, vowed to protect the son of an informant killed years ago. When street gangs start a turf war, the boy gets caught in the crossfire, and Hatch must fight to keep him safe.

title: Despicable Me 4
description: Gru, Lucy, Margo, Edith, and Agnes welcome a new member to the family, Gru Jr., who is intent on tormenting his dad. Gru faces a new nemesis in Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina, and the family is forced to go on the run.

title: Die Hart 2: Die Harter
description: Kevin Hart, now the world's biggest action star, finds himself the victim of an evil revenge plot and must enlist the help of his favorite co-star and his over-eager assistant if he wants to survive.

title: Dragonkeeper
description: The dragons of ancient China are on the brink of extinction; their only hope is a brave young girl on a perilous journey to save the last dragon egg.

title: Due Justice
description: After the murder of his wife and kidnapping of his daughter, an attorney with a rigorous military background seeks revenge on the gang responsible.

title: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

title: Dunki
description: A group of friends from a village in Punjab share a common dream: to go to England. Their problem is that they have neither the visa nor the ticket. A soldier promises to take them to the land of their dreams. Dunki is a comedy revolving around this.

title: End of the Rope
description: When a family mysteriously disappears from the town of Schafer, North Dakota, suspicion lands on a sociopathic farmhand. Based on the true story of the infamous Charles Bannon case of 1931.

title: Evil Does Not Exist
description: A father and daughter's peaceful life in a rural village is disrupted by plans for a glamping site, leading to unsettling incidents and a confrontation with environmental destruction.

title: Exhuma (파묘)
description: The film includes mystery and occult elements, and follows the process of excavating an ominous grave, which unleashes dreadful consequences buried underneath.

title: Free State of Jones
description: During the Civil War, Newt Knight, a defiant Southern farmer, leads a rebellion against the Confederacy. Banding together with other small farmers and local slaves, Knight launches an uprising that leads Jones County, Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy, creating a Free State of Jones.

title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
description: As the world fell, young Furiosa is snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers and falls into the hands of a great Biker Horde led by the Warlord Dementus. Sweeping through the Wasteland they come across the Citadel presided over by The Immortan Joe. While the two Tyrants war for dominance, Furiosa must survive many trials as she puts together the means to find her way home.

title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
description: The Spengler family and the original Ghostbusters team up to stop an ancient evil artifact from unleashing a second ice age on New York City.

title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
description: Godzilla and the mighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race. The film delves further into the histories of these Titans and their origins, as well as the mysteries of Skull Island and beyond, while uncovering the mythic battle that helped forge these extraordinary beings and tied them to humankind forever.

title: Gran Turismo
description: Based on the true story of Jann Mardenborough, a teenage Gran Turismo player whose gaming skills won him a series of Nissan competitions to become an actual professional race car driver.

title: Hit Man
description: A seasoned hitman's life takes a comedic turn when he accidentally attends an acting class and discovers a hidden talent for performing. Embracing his newfound passion, he starts auditioning for real roles, leading to unexpected and hilarious consequences.

title: I Saw the TV Glow
description: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show -- a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owen's view of reality begins to crack.

title: IF
description: Follows a young girl who embarks on an adventure with an imaginary friend to rediscover her sense of wonder.

title: Immaculate
description: An American nun embarks on a new journey when she joins a remote convent in the Italian countryside. However, her warm welcome quickly turns into a living nightmare when she discovers her new home harbors a sinister secret and unspeakable horrors.

title: In a Violent Nature
description: When a group of teens takes a locket from a collapsed fire tower in the woods, they unwittingly resurrect the rotting corpse of Johnny, a vengeful spirit spurred on by a horrific 60-year old crime. The undead killer soon embarks on a bloody rampage to retrieve the stolen locket, methodically slaughtering anyone who gets in his way.

title: Killers of the Flower Moon
description: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major FBI investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
description: Several years after the events of War for the Planet of the Apes, Caesar's colony of apes is threatened by a new faction of humans who have survived the Simian Flu.

title: Kung Fu Panda 4
description: Po faces his most formidable enemy yet: the Chameleon, a cunning sorceress who can summon villains from the past. Po must confront these old foes anew while searching for and training the next Dragon Warrior.

title: Love Lies Bleeding
description: From Director Rose Glass comes an electric new love story. Reclusive gym manager Lou falls hard for Jackie, an ambitious bodybuilder headed through town to Vegas in pursuit of her dream. But their love ignites violence, pulling them deep into thedangerous world of competitive bodybuilding. This darkly funny, stylishly thrilling film follows two women who will stop at nothing to protect each other - and themselves.

title: Madame Web
description: A woman discovers she has psychic sensory powers that allow her to see into the spider world itself.

title: Mean Girls
description: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Regina's ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

title: Miller's Girl
description: A creative writing assignment yields complex results between a high school student and her teacher.

title: Mystic Singer
description: Ayu, with Sarinten's spirit, expelled from Banyuwangi, embodies the mystical figure in Trenggalek's Watu Kandang.

title: Rebel Moon: Part Two: The Scargiver
description: The Rebel gears up for battle against the Motherworld as unbreakable bonds are forged, heroes emerge and legends are made.

title: Rebel Moon: Part One: A Child Of Fire
description: When the ruthless forces of the Motherworld threaten a quiet farming village on a distant moon, a mysterious outsider becomes its best hope for survival.

title: Side Effects
description: A young woman's world unravels when a drug prescribed by her psychiatrist has unexpected side effects.

title: Smallfoot
description: A yeti is convinced that the elusive creatures known as "smallfoot" (humans) really do exist.

title: Space Cadet
description: A Florida party girl with a dream of going to space gets accepted into NASA's astronaut training program with a doctored application. Now, she must prove she has the right stuff to make it through the rigorous training and into the cosmos before her secret is revealed.

title: Tarot
description: When a group of friends recklessly violates the sacred rule of Tarot readings, they unknowingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within the cursed cards. One by one, they come face to face with fate and end up in a race against death to escape the future foretold in their readings.

title: The Beekeeper
description: A man's quest for vengeance against a powerful and mysterious organization after his daughter is kidnapped.

title: The Bikeriders
description: Kathy, a strong-willed member of a Midwestern motorcycle club, recounts the club's evolution over the course of a decade, from a gathering place for local outsiders into a more sinister gang, and the lives of her husband Benny and their friend Johnny.

title: The Corpse Washer
description: In the wake of her mother's sudden passing, a small-town corpse washer sets out to find the terrifying truth behind a series of mysterious deaths.

title: The Creator
description: Amidst a future war between the human race and the forces of artificial intelligence, Joshua, a hardened ex-special forces agent grieving the disappearance of his wife, is recruited to hunt down and kill the Creator, the elusive architect of advanced AI who has developed a mysterious weapon with the power to end the war... and all of humankind.

title: The Exorcism
description: A troubled actor begins to unravel while shooting a horror film. His estranged daughter wonders if he's slipping back into his past addictions or if there's something more sinister at play.

title: The Fall Guy
description: A down-and-out stuntman must find the missing star of his ex-girlfriend's blockbuster film.

title: The First Omen
description: A woman starts to question her own faith when she uncovers a terrifying conspiracy to bring about the birth of evil incarnate in Rome.

title: The Garfield Movie
description: After an unexpected reunion with his long-lost father, Vic, a streetwise cat, Garfield is forced to leave his comfortable life behind and embark on a crazy heist with Vic and Odie.

title: The Girl in the Spider's Web
description: Young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander and journalist Mikael Blomkvist find themselves caught in a web of spies, cyber criminals, and corrupt government officials.

title: The Marvels
description: Carol Danvers, Kamala Khan, and Monica Rambeau begin swapping places with each other every time they use their powers and must team-up to figure out why.

title: The Mechanic
description: Arthur Bishop, a professional assassin, takes on Steve McKenna, the son of a former target, as his apprentice.

title: The Portable Door
description: Two lowly, put-upon interns at a mysterious London firm that makes magic happen become entangled in a battle between ancient magical forces.

title: The Strangers: Chapter 1
description: A young couple's road trip takes a terrifying turn when they are stalked and tormented by three masked psychopaths at a secluded Airbnb.

title: The Watchers
description: When Mina, a solitary woman living in the Irish countryside, discovers she's being watched by something unseen, she is drawn into a terrifying battle for survival with a mysterious predator.

title: Through My Window: Across the Sea
description: Ares and Raquel maintain a long-distance relationship during his studies in Stockholm. When they meet again, they find that their period of separation has put their love to the test.

title: Through My Window: Looking at You
description: After a tumultuous summer, Raquel and Ares struggle to redefine their relationship and end up going their separate ways. However, fate brings them back together in the winter, rekindling their undeniable love and desire for each other. Can they overcome family pressures and find a way to make their relationship work?

title: Trigger Warning
description: A skilled Special Forces commando takes ownership of her father's bar after he suddenly dies and soon finds herself at odds with a violent gang running rampant in her hometown.

title: Ultraman: Rising
description: When Tokyo is threatened by rising monster attacks, baseball star Ken Sato reluctantly returns home to take on the mantle of Ultraman. But the titanic superhero meets his match when he reluctantly adopts ababy Kaiju who sees him as her papa.

title: Under Paris
description: To save Paris from a bloodbath, a grieving scientist is forced to face her tragic past when a giant shark appears in the Seine.

title: Venom
description: When Eddie Brock acquires the powers of a symbiote, he will have to release his alter-ego "Venom" to save his life.

title: Wish
description: A young girl named Asha makes a wish so powerful that it is answered by a cosmic force, a little ball of boundless energy called Star. Together, they face the most formidable of foes to save her community and prove that when the will of a courageous human connects with the magic of the stars, wondrous things can happen.
